remarks: Version of ~ cbval2 with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-cbval2v.1 $e |- F/ z ph $.
bj-cbval2v.2 $e |- F/ w ph $.
bj-cbval2v.3 $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-cbval2v.4 $e |- F/ y ps $.
bj-cbval2v.5 $e |- ( ( x = z /\ y = w ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-cbval2v $p |- ( A. x A. y ph <-> A. z A. w ps ) $.
$d w x y z $.
